sentences.sContent: From one perspective, the development of a very small penis could be considered the next step in male hominid evolution.
sentences.sContent_eng: From one perspective, the development of a very small penis could be considered the next step in male hominid evolution.
sentences.sCn: 从这一角度看，在原始男性进化中，非常小阴茎的男人在下一步可能优先考虑发展。

sentences.sContent: So the ejaculation of semen goes backwards, up the penis and into the bladder.
sentences.sContent_eng: So the ejaculation of semen goes backwards, up the penis and into the bladder.
sentences.sCn: 所以射精时精液是逆向的，顺着阴茎向上到了膀胱里。

trans.tranOther: the outer sex organ of men and male animals, which is used for sex and through which waste water comes out of the body
